thread.title: Watch: Dream Theater Performs 'Images & Words' Live In Its Entirety [News]
thread.title_full: Watch: Dream Theater Performs 'Images & Words' Live In Its Entirety [News]

title: Watch: Dream Theater Performs 'Images & Words' Live In Its Entirety [News]
text:
UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 3 hours ago 2 
As previously reported, Dream Theater are celebrating the 25th anniversary of their monumental 1992 effort " Images and Words " by playing the album in full on tour. 
Footage from the shows was quick to surface, you can check out what the whole thing sounds like in the embedded players below.
